resources.string:
I am a Data Science enthusiast with knowledge in Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Data Analysis, and using these skills to develop AI models for algorithmic predictions and classifications involving mechanical and electrical subsystems.


I have engrossed myself in various academic projects related to data science, machine learning and deep learning, incorporating various concepts of Industry 4.0, predictive maintenance, digital twin and analytics.


Along with this, I am the overall coordinator at NVCTI which is the innovation and incubation cell at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad and also the student internship representative in my discipline.
